snippet: There is one job on Wall Street for which pay has continued to rise since the financial crisis: board member. | Michael S. Steinberg is the most senior SAC Capital Advisors employee to be ensnared in the government’s insider trading investigation....
abstract: There is one job on Wall Street for which pay has continued to rise since the financial crisis: board member. | Michael S. Steinberg is the most senior SAC Capital Advisors employee to be ensnared in the government’s insider trading investigation. | A Dell proxy statement sheds light on the process of fielding interest from bidders. | Efforts to replace corporate directors rarely succeed.

headline.main: On Wall Street, It's Good to Be a Director
